question: (Sarah of the Clue Crew stands with a robot at SRI International at Menlo Park, CA.)  Developed in the 1960s, Shakey the robot could carry out complex operations; according to the Robot Hall of Fame, he was the first mobile robot to do this, meaning to think logically
